item.description:
>>>King Richard's Faire<<<

>> Weekly dig deal for $13 <<

It's time for a nerd pilgrimage to the Faire.

PLEASE PUT IN YOUR RSVP IF YOU"RE WILLING TO MEET AT ALEWIFE AT 9:00 to consolidate cars and give the carless rides.

It opens at 10:30am, don't know how crowded it is at that time (the last time I went was back in ye olde 1900s - I remember crowds)...

Nick's suggestions below of where and when to meet are good with me.

MAP of the realm


  • 1st meeting spot could be at the word "Mappe" at the bottom right. 10-1030am... just INSIDE the gate. i'll wait 15 minutes or so. I'll wear my meetup shirt... there are a lot of assistant organizers going - so hopefully you'll recognize the group if you don't meet us right at 10:30.
  • 2nd spot could be above the "t" in "tourney field" at top, middle. 12-1230pm.



Also watch the NerdFunBoston twitter feed throughout the day - several of us may be posting our locations and times and schedules and such.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign, red t-shirt with meetup sticker. I'll be at the entrance for 15 minutes.
item.name: King Richard's Faire
